title: Crypto.Games
author: Crypto.Games
content: Dice Giveaway - We're giving away $50 in BTC to the player who hits 7,500,000,000th bet.Rules- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- Minimum bet: 1000 satoshi or altcoin equivalent.- To claim reward, player has to report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required BetID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!

comments.author: Crypto.Games
comments.body: Prize was won by Raguel. Gratz.
